design_system.name: VoltFit Performance System
design_system.description: A dark, high-contrast aesthetic inspired by elite sports data centers and night-time city runs. It uses deep obsidian backgrounds with electric neon accents to create a sense of energy and focus.

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-tight, font-black (800/900). Use for all section titles and key metrics.
usage_rules.body: Regular or Medium weight. High legibility. Use for lists, descriptions, and chat.
usage_rules.labels: Uppercase, tracking-widest, text-xs, font-bold. Use for chart axes and small UI tags.

buttons.primary: bg-[#CCFF00] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wide hover:bg-[#B3E600] shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(204,255,0,0.3)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#27272A] text-white hover:border-[#CCFF00] hover:text-[#CCFF00] uppercase tracking-wide

cards.default: bg-[#18181B] border border-[#27272A] hover:border-[#3F3F46] transition-colors duration-300

inputs.default: bg-[#09090B] border border-[#27272A] text-white focus:border-[#CCFF00] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#CCFF00] placeholder:text-[#52525B]

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to prevent banding.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use colored shadows for primary elements: shadow-[0_4px_20px_rgba(204,255,0,0.15)]
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are preferred over shadows for separation in dark mode.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a technical look.

usage.hero: Use 'abstract_bg' with a heavy dark gradient overlay for the landing page hero.
usage.features: Use 'meal_prep' for the Nutrition section, 'social_group' for the Community section.
usage.integration: Use 'digital_scale' and 'smart_watch' in the Devices/Integration section.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on #CCFF00 is BLACK. Text on #09090B must be WHITE or #A1A1AA.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings in #CCFF00 are mandatory for keyboard navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. THEME: Force Dark Mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless explicitly requested by user interaction (default to dark).
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Dashboard. Mix 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 tiles.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style them with the neon palette (#CCFF00, #00E0FF). Hide grid lines or make them very subtle (#27272A).
6. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. SHADCN: Customize all Shadcn components to match the 'Performance Pro' archetype (square corners, dark bg, neon accents).
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, prefer solid tech borders.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
